low_picture_resolution_description: Low resolution pictures will be loaded to minimize data usage.
normal_picture_resolution_description: Pictures will be loaded with full resolution.
error_danbooru: Failed to fetch data from Danbooru.
error_no_posts: Not enough posts of this source in Danbooru.
search_no_matches_description: Only searching for danbooru copyright tags (anime, games...) to play a quiz on characters from them is currently supported.
exit_quiz_confirmation: Sure you want to quit Quiz?
exit_quiz_confirmation_description: Your progress in this quiz will be lost.
no_cheat_description: You can open the Danbooru post after you answer.
skip_confirmation: Sure you want to skip this image?
skip_confirmation_description: It will count as a wrong answer.
more_pics_confirmation_character: Want to see more images of this character?
more_pics_confirmation_source: Want to see more images of this source?
hint_confirmation: Want to spend points to reveal the answer?
hint_confirmation_description: It will count as a correct answer.
about_text: This game was originally a practice project to learn programming, so I would really be grateful if someone ends up enjoying it. Thanks to Google's Flutter team and to the whole community of Danbooru for making it possible. All images belong to their awesome authors.
